msg: [classlib][swing] JOptionPane creates dialogs with double decorations if default look&feel is undecorated

author: mloenko
msg: HARMONY-1543: awt.Font.getFamily(Locale) with null Locale returns family on Harmony and throws NPE on RI
HARMONY-1546: java.awt.Font.getFont() with null system property parameter throws NPE on RI while doesn't on Harmony.
HARMONY-1549: java.awt.Font.getMaxCharBounds() with null FontRenderContext returns bounds on Harmony and throws NPE on RI

author: mloenko
msg: [classlib][awt] Swing components lose focus immediately after gaining it by mouse press

author: mloenko
msg: Unexpected IAE from DataFlavor.isMimeTypeEqual method when parameter is empty string

author: blin
msg: 1. remove rhino from distribution because of licensing requirement.
3. remove maven from trunk. developers would need to download maven 2.0.4 and install it to another directory for build if they have been using maven installation under trunk directory.
4. rename trunk/test to trunk/benchmark, it really just contains performance benchmark code.
